Author: fuckwhywhywhy
Text: lol I did this all the time   I’ve actually gotten to the point that I don’t have to ask him to hide it, I just don’t weigh myself obsessively anymore. I went from weighing myself multiple times a morning (up until I first ate something) to now I only weigh myself like once every week or week and a half. He would hide it a lot/ take it in his truck to work so it kind of broke the habit   Now if I could just stop all of the other eating disorder bs that’d be great
